unnormalised: Arre yaar, navo flat mhojea dokyek duk dita. Builder-an sangilem 1200 sq ft asa mhunn, punn lhan dista. Bhintti fokot 4 incha motta asa – hanvemuch mapun ghetlem! Ani kitchen-acho countertop? 20 mm granite mhunn bhas dilem, maka 15 mm bhaxen dista. Atam maka taka portun phone korcho poddtta. Kitli tension!"
normalised: Arre yaar, hem novem flat mhojek dukhi dita. Builder-an mhonnlem ek thousand don xim square feet asa, punn lahan dista. Divo chār inch mottaiyeche asa - hanvem mhapun ghetlem! Ani kitchen-achi countertop? Vīs millimeter granite mhonnlem, pandhra millimeter dista mhojek. Atam taka porot phone korcho poddtolo. Kitli chinta!"
text: Arre yaar, navo flat mhojea dokyek duk dita. Builder-an sangilem 1200 sq ft asa mhunn, punn lhan dista. Bhintti fokot 4 incha motta asa – hanvemuch mapun ghetlem! Ani kitchen-acho countertop? 20 mm granite mhunn bhas dilem, maka 15 mm bhaxen dista. Atam maka taka portun phone korcho poddtta. Kitli tension!"
